item.title: Static Site Generators
item.description: You may have noticed that the GitHub Pages Starter Pack is getting a bit crowded. Well, now i’m looking into options besides jekyll, to expand my skills, and try out some themes that aren’t available for Jekyll. I’ll be honest, if you are new like me, getting jekyll themes to work is tricky. Many of them are not supported anymore. What is a Static Site Generator (SSG)? There are some configuration files, layouts and templates, and then there is all your content that your create.
